oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Rehearsal - 1946-10-28 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Rehearsal from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on October 28, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Mary Lou; Hiram Higsby; Oklahoma Songbirds; Dick Reinhart
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Opening statements and theme / (1:32) Hiram Higsby introduces Chuck Davis / (1:45) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform "Listen To The Mockingbird" / (3:11) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (3:34) Mary Lou performs "Yodeling Cowgirl" / (5:28) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (6:23) Hiram Higsby performs "Ain’t We Crazy" / (8:05) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (9:00) The Oklahoma Songbirds perform "Cow Puncher Blues" / (11:20) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke through a skit / (12:37) Dick Reinhart performs "A Tiny Little Voice In A Tiny Little Prayer"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Reinhart, Dick;
